capabilities.name: create_entities
capabilities.description: Create multiple new entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: create_relations
capabilities.description: Create multiple new relations between entities in the knowledge graph. Relations should be in active voice

capabilities.name: add_observations
capabilities.description: Add new observations to existing entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_entities
capabilities.description: Delete multiple entities and their associated relations from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_observations
capabilities.description: Delete specific observations from entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_relations
capabilities.description: Delete multiple relations from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: search_nodes
capabilities.description: Search for nodes in the knowledge graph based on a query

capabilities.name: open_nodes
capabilities.description: Open specific nodes in the knowledge graph by their names

capabilities.name: update_entities
capabilities.description: Update multiple existing entities in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: update_relations
capabilities.description: Update multiple existing relations in the knowledge graph
